chargeHist.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault)
Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Rafael Ruiz Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault) [Modifiers: Repeater, Lifetime Supervision of Serious Sex Offenders], a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.025(1)(e).
  • 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child [Modifiers: Lifetime Supervision of Serious Sex Offenders, Repeater], a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Case Called: 1:22 pm
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by DA Theresa Wetzsteon. Defendant appears in custody and with Atty Stephen Willett.
Parties make statements. Court addresses the parties. 
Parties discuss PSI Reports. Parties note that there are no corrections to be made to the PSI Reports. 
Parties are to proceed with testimony at this time.
H.W. sworn and testifies.
M.S. sworn and testifies.
OTR- 2:42 PM
BOTR- 2:54 PM
Continue testimony with M.S.
State makes sentencing arguments.
Atty Willett makes sentencing arguments.
Defendant makes statement.
COURT addresses the parties. Court addresses the Defendant.

COURT ORDERS:
Ct. 1 (Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault)-Repeater-Lifetime Supervision of Serious Sex Offenders))>> 27 Years WSPS, 15 Years IC and 12 Years ES, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: Lifetime Supervision. Sex Offender Counseling as recommended, Lifetime Sex Offender Registry, No Contact with Victims, Counseling/Treatment/Evaluations as recommended, Comply with any intervention programs and fully comply with all directives of the agent during ES, Follow any Sex Offender Rules of Supervision once released, DOC to pay 25% of any and all prison account fund toward payment of restitution/fines/court ordered obligations, DNA Sample and Surcharge. Defendant is not eligble for SAP or CIP. Defendant has 1175 Days Credit.  

Ct. 2 (2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child-Lifetime Supervision of Serious Sex Offenders-Repeater)>> 27 Years WSPS, 15 Years IC and 12 Years ES, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: Lifetime Supervision. Sex Offender Counseling as recommended, Lifetime Sex Offender Registry, No Contact with Victims, Counseling/Treatment/Evaluations as recommended, Comply with any intervention programs and fully comply with all directives of an agent during ES, Follow any Sex Offender Rules of Supervision once released, DOC pay 25% of any and all prison account fund toward payment of restitution/fines/court ordered obligations, DNA Sample and Surcharge. Defendant is not eligble for SAP or CIP. Defendant has 1175 Days Credit. 

PSI'S ARE TO BE SEALED.
ALL EXHIBITS ARE TO BE SEALED.
REMANDED TO WSPS.
